card.name: Alabaster Potion

card.name: Amrou Kithkin
card.property: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Angry Mob
card.property: Trample During your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. During turns other than yours, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.

card.name: Animate Wall
card.property: Enchant Wall Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Armageddon
card.property: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Balance
card.property: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

card.name: Benalish Hero
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Black Ward
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black. This effect doesn't remove Black Ward.

card.name: Blessing
card.property: Enchant creature {W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue

card.name: Fortified Area
card.property: Wall creatures you control get +1/+0 and have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.

card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Only Personal Incarnation's owner may activate this ability. When Personal Incarnation dies, its owner loses half their life, rounded up.
